com.communote.server.api.core.security.permission

Class BasePermissionManagement<T,N,E extends AuthorizationException>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.api.core.security.permission.BasePermissionManagement<T,N,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the entity, this service works for.
    N - Type of the according creation entity, this service works for.
    E - The type of the exception to be thrown when the current user does not have a required permission.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PermissionManagement<T,N,E>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NotePermissionManagementImpl, TopicPermissionManagementImpl

    public abstract class BasePermissionManagement<T,N,E extends AuthorizationException>
extends Object
implements PermissionManagement<T,N,E>
    Service for providing permissions for a given entity.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      • hasAndGetWithPermission

        @Transactional(readOnly=true)
public <R> R hasAndGetWithPermission(long entityId,
                                                                    Permission<T> permission,
                                                                    Converter<T,R> converter)
                                                             throws E extends AuthorizationException,
                                                                    NotFoundException
        Description copied from interface: PermissionManagement
        Checks the permission and returns the given entity converted with the provided converter if the current user has the requested permission.
        Specified by:
        hasAndGetWithPermission in interface PermissionManagement<T,N,E extends AuthorizationException>
        Type Parameters:
        R - the target type of the conversion
        Parameters:
        entityId - ID of the entity
        permission - The permission the user must have.
        converter - the converter to convert the result
        Returns:
        The entity.
        Throws:
        E - in case the current user doesn't have the given permission.
        NotFoundException - in case the entity does not exist
        E extends AuthorizationException
